title: Cat Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Umm.... There. This is the video<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>So this is the cat video that you watched with Rin-san, huh, Ayumu-san.... Fufu, it’s adorable<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I-, it’s so small.... I wonder how you’re supposed to handle it when it’s this small<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Isn’t it okay to use the same amount of force you use to pet Kasumi-chan, Shizuku-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Aah, yeah, that seems right. How about it, Shizuku-chan? Why don’t you try it on us? Try petting us<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeh!? No way, I can’t touch my senpai’s heads.... That would be rude....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s fine~, pretty please nyan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Please don’t hold back nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufufu, okay then, here I go.... Pet pet<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Give us more nyan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
